snippet: As a debate in Congress over whether to extend green-card privileges to foreign students drags on, students are looking at opportunities outside the United States.

byline.original: By PAUL BASKEN | THE CHRONICLE OF HIGHER EDUCATION

lead_paragraph: As a debate in Congress over whether to extend green-card privileges to foreign students drags on, students are looking at opportunities outside the United States.

headline.main: Stuck in Visa Debate, U.S. Risks Losing Researchers
headline.print_headline: Stuck in Visa Debate, U.S. Risks Losing Researchers
